text: 3 Women is a 1977 American drama movie directed by Robert Altman and starring Shelley Duvall, Sissy Spacek and Janice Rule. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American psychological movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1970s psychological movies
title: 3 Women
